description:
An updated classic featuring the evolution of the Djinn carabiner and the STRING. Petzl has optimized the carabiner’s inners, giving it a larger rope basket and runner end. These tweaks make mounting the draw easier, and it is more likely to stay exactly where you want it. The evolved STRING now does an even better job of keeping your carabiner in the right position. This 6-pack of durable and reliable draws is ready to rack up and get business done.

  • Djinn biners: one straight, one bent
  • Larger rope basket and optimized runner end, all without making the carabiner any larger
  • Keylock snag-free nose design
  • Rope-end biner is equipped with a STRING protector that reduces twisting and helps to maintain the rope-end carabiner orientation
  • Includes 6 x 11cm Djinn Quickdraws
name: Petzl Djinn Axess Quickdraw (6 Pack)
